ul.li: This method and the method both support setting mirror effects. Agora recommends using only one of them; using both may cause the mirror effect to overlap and the setting to fail.

The config specified in this method represents the maximum values under ideal network conditions. If the video engine cannot render the video using the specified config due to unstable network conditions, it will try lower parameters in the list until a usable configuration is found.

section.title: Timing
section.p: You can call this method before or after joining a channel. If you do not need to reset the video encoding properties after joining the channel, Agora recommends calling this method before to reduce the time to render the first video frame.
